result.notes: Organisation chart for the QEII Conference Centre

organization.name: queen-elizabeth-ii-conference-centre
organization.title: Queen Elizabeth II Conference Centre
organization.description:
The QEII Conference Centre (QEIICC) is an international events venue that hosts conferences and receptions for up to 2,500 delegates in Westminster, London.

QEIICC is an executive agency of the Department for Communities and Local Government

http://www.qeiicc.co.uk/

result.title: Organogram

extras.value: Details of senior staff and their salaries can be found in the QEII annual report at: http://www.official-documents.gov.uk/document/hc1314/hc05/0574/0574.pdf
